rules_text: Whenever you attack, roll three six-sided dice. If two match, create a Treasure token and draw a card. If all three match, create two Treasure tokens and draw two cards. If you rolled exactly a 4{,}{ }{a}{ }5{,}{ }{a}{n}{d}{ }{a}{ }6, draw three cards and until end of turn you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
